entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -1.5°C

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then cloudy. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 25 March 2023
